A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I expected so much more from this film. Talk about character assassinations. I have no idea how the third movie of this trilogy will make any sense of this disaster. A slow-motion space chase and have our hero die on an island in a galaxy far\, far\, away from any action whatsoever. Yikes that is bad! Luke said it best\, “ I don’t think you’re going to like the way this ends.”
